thread.title: Pleasant hotel
thread.title_full: Pleasant hotel - Review of Grange Rochester Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: The_4DDs
title: Pleasant hotel
text: I stayed there twice. First time I got a huge room on the ground floor. I was worried about the noise of the street, but it was quiet. Second time, I got a very tiny room just big enough for a single bed! Overall the hotel is smallish but good enough. Good cleanliness. The dinning area is quiet small with the table very cramped. Waitresses not very joyful.
